cause.description:
Multiple myeloma is cancer of the plasma cells, and thus far, no cure has been found. It is the second most common blood cancer. The MMRF is a non-profit organization driven by a single purpose: to accelerate the search for a cure for multiple myeloma. "Help us help them find a cure." The only way to help is by donating and spreading the word, please pass this along!
1. DONATE PLEASE!
2. A cure needs to be found today!
cause.mission: help find a cure for multiple myeloma
cause.name: MMRF
